abstract: Editorial urges Congress to seize opportunity to strengthen Freedom of Information Act while Senate and House have similar pending bills that seek to increase transparency; suggests that Republicans could use legislation to secure significant bipartisan accomplishment that is in the public interest.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers have a second chance to enact legislation that would bring more transparency to the workings of government.

headline.main: A Stronger Freedom of Information Act
headline.print_headline: A Stronger Freedom of Information Act

snippet: Lawmakers have a second chance to enact legislation that would bring more transparency to the workings of government.
